DOC.brief_summary: The frequent side effect associate Actimmune ( interferon gamma 1b ) therapy occurrence 'flu-like symptom ' ( FLS ) , might include fever , chill , muscle ache , tiredness . Earlier study demonstrate symptoms common healthy volunteer well patient . This study design determine whether titration dose reduces frequency severity FLS . A report study another interferon ( interferon beta ) , demonstrate reduction frequency severity FLS titration dose use . This study compare effect standard dose regimen titration regimen healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Determining Effect Actimmune ( Interferon Gamma 1b ) Dose Titration Flu-Like Symptoms Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Ability understand purpose & risk BMI 1832kg/m2 Females contraception History HIV , pos test HCV Ab , HBsAg History chronic fatigue syndrome fibromyalgia Flu like illness within 1 month start History depression mood disorder History malignant premalignant disease History severe allergic reaction Known allergy Actimmune component History major disease Clinically Significant abnormal lab Pregnant breastfeeding Clinically abnormal ECG History alcohol substance abuse Other study participation last 4 week Serious infection within 3 month Use Rx product within 4 week except contraceptive dermatology product Vaccinations within 2 week Tobacco product ( limitation ) Cant/wont comply study requirement Allergy shot within 1 month Blood donation limitation Investigator discretion unsuitability
